# validate(_:)

**Type Method**

Checks if the URL is a valid network block device URL.

## Declaration

```swift
class func validate(_ URL: URL) throws
```

## Parameters

- **URL**: The NBD URL to validate.

## Discussion

This method checks that the URL is well-formed; however, it doesn’t attempt to access the URL. See the [https://github.com/NetworkBlockDevice/nbd/blob/master/doc/uri.md] on GitHub for more detailed descriptions of valid URIs.
title: validate(_:)
